mapper.select: SELECT * , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_MENU m2 WHERE m2.UPPER_MENU_IDX = m1.IDX ) AS UNDER_CNT FROM TBL_MENU m1 ORDER BY TITLE , SEQ
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_MENU(TYPE , DEPTH , TITLE , UPPER_MENU_IDX , SEQ , NAME , LINK , CREATE_TM , UPDATE_TM) VALUES (#{type} , #{depth} , #{title} , #{upper_menu_idx} , #{seq} , #{name} , #{link} , now() , now())
mapper.update: UPDATE TBL_MENU SET TYPE = #{type}, SEQ = #{seq}, NAME = #{name}, LINK = #{link}, UPDATE_TM = now() WHERE IDX = #{idx}

update.if: SELECT @seq:=0; UPDATE TBL_MENU SET TITLE = @seq:=@seq+1 WHERE UPPER_MENU_IDX = #{upper_menu_idx};
SELECT @seq:=0; UPDATE TBL_MENU SET TITLE = CONCAT(#{upper_title},@seq:=@seq+1) WHERE UPPER_MENU_IDX = #{upper_menu_idx};

mapper.update: SELECT @seq:=0; UPDATE TBL_MENU SET SEQ = @seq:=@seq+1 WHERE UPPER_MENU_IDX = #{upper_menu_idx} ORDER BY SEQ;
